name: Swarmcade
description:
Can you survive the relentless swarm? In this arcade take on the 'Bullet Heaven'/Survivors-like action roguelite, you'll slay 1000s of foes, level up, loot chests and try to make your character more powerful than ever. Spend gold to unlock perma-upgrades and additional heroes, so you can beat the odds on future runs.

Features


  • Auto shooting with easy to pick up, hard to master gameplay
  • Rapid levelling with <30 minute runs
  • An endless spawning horde to kill. The enemies will only stop spawning if you can get to the final wave, but then you'll face an enemy to truly test your build
  • 6+ heroes with different powers (and unlockables)
  • 30+ different weapons and items to wield, each can be levelled up for more power
  • Combo weapons and items into devastating ultimate weapons
  • 16 perma upgrades to work on between runs
